data.text: @Starla9861 @GovInslee By what measure?  Help me understand why you would say that.

@thoughtbench @5mutmeg @GovInslee Y’all need to go after all of the school boards with the surety bond approach. Threaten to sue them personably against their surety bonds. Look at bonds for the win. It works

@thoughtbench @GovInslee Not at my kids private school.
 It’s over.
@thoughtbench @GovInslee The child abuse Seattle teachers are inflicting on kids is criminal. Defund Seattle Teachers. Fucking selfish abusers.

@thoughtbench L&I does NOT control children. Health Districts cannot tell minors what to do. School boards approve or deny union contracts. Bonds for the Win. Com find it! Go after local teachers union, school board and Supt. No law...no mask.
@thoughtbench @GovInslee Time to pull our kids out!

@thoughtbench @GovInslee It’s absurd.  I feel like the teachers union is holding these poor kids hostage.  How can they justify going against CDC, county and state?   We are living in such a bubble.  Enough is enough.
